altername_name: Isto E Zico: Zico no Kangaeru Soccer
name: Isto é Zico: Zico no Kangaeru Soccer
overview: Isto é Zico: Zico no Kangaeru Soccer (イスト・エ・ジーコ ジーコの 考えるサッカー) is an interactive movie for the Sega Saturn endorsed by Brazillian football player Arthur Antunes Coimbra, otherwise known as Zico.
